iching.title: Wisdom of the I Ching
iching.subtitle: Receive ancient wisdom through the oracle of changes
iching.prompt: Calm your mind and press the button to receive guidance.
iching.meihuaHint: Time Reading uses Meihua numerology based on the current moment
iching.changingHint: Click on a line to toggle changing status
iching.question: Your Question (Optional)
iching.loginToSave: Please log in to save readings
iching.aiError: An error occurred while generating the interpretation.

about.whatIsText: The I Ching, or Book of Changes, is one of the oldest and most profound wisdom texts in human history. Dating back over 3,000 years, it has guided emperors, scholars, and seekers of truth through life's complexities.
about.hexagramsText: The I Ching consists of 64 hexagrams, each made of six lines that can be solid (Yang) or broken (Yin). These hexagrams represent all possible situations and transformations in the universe.
about.castingText: Traditionally cast with yarrow stalks or three coins, the I Ching responds to your sincere questions. The resulting hexagram offers wisdom about your current situation and potential changes ahead.
about.changingText: Some lines may be 'changing' - transforming from Yin to Yang or vice versa. These changing lines reveal the dynamic nature of your situation and point toward future developments.
